text: Ani jara te doghe (mata-pita) tujhyavara ya gostica dabava takatila ki tu majhyasobata (dusaryala) sahabhagi tharava, jyace tula jnana nasave, tevha tu tyance ajnapalana karu nakosa, parantu ya jagata tyancyasi bhalepanaca vyavahara kara ani tyacya margavara calata raha, jo majhyakade jhukalela asela. Tumha sarvance paratane majhyacakade ahe. Tumhi je kahi karata tyasambandhi mi tya veli tumhala mahita karena
